function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased air change rate due to window opening","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration systems, use air purifiers, and enforce mask-wearing indoors","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, HEPA filters, UV-C air purifiers","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and facility maintenance staff"}]}
